algorithm.name: WHISPERDETECTION
algorithm.description: Uses OpenAI's Whisper model to perform language detection in speech.

properties.name: WHISPER_MODEL_LANG
properties.description: Whisper has English-only models and multilingual models. Set to 'en' for English-only models and 'multi' for multilingual models.

properties.name: WHISPER_MODEL_SIZE
properties.description: Whisper models come in multiple sizes; 'tiny', 'base', 'small', 'medium', and 'large'. Multilingual models are available in all 5 sizes. English-only models are not available in 'large' size, but are available in the other four sizes .

properties.name: WHISPER_MODE
properties.description: Set to '0' for spoken language detection, '1' for speech-to-text transcription, and '2' for speech translation.

properties.name: AUDIO_LANGUAGE
properties.description: Optional property that indicates the language to use for audio translation or transcription. If left as an empty string, Whisper will automatically detect a single language from the first 30 seconds of audio.

actions.name: WHISPER DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Uses OpenAI's Whisper model to perform language detection in speech.

tasks.name: WHISPER DETECTION TASK
tasks.description: Uses OpenAI's Whisper model to perform language detection in speech.
